$V Dignāre: $R sine peccātō nōs custōdīre. ^ To keep us without sin.
$R et clamor meus ad te veniat. ^ and let my cry come unto thee.

O Lord: et omnes insidiās inimīcī ab ea longē repelle; angelī tuī sanctī habitent in eā
column7: et benedīctiō tua sit super nōs semper. ^ Visit
column11: and drive far from it the snares of the enemy; let thy holy angels dwell herein to preserve us in peace
column12: and let thy blessing be always upon us.

nocte ista: quī tecum vīvit et regnat in ūnitāte Spīritus Sanctī
O Lord: per omnia saecula saeculōrum. ^ Through Jesus Christ
column7: Who liveth and reigneth with thee
column8: in the unity of the Holy Spirit
